text: Hai so Miyamaratiyaya! Mbaloi kano a manga tabanga o Allah: Ishan o KÄ¶Kiyatharowa o Isa a Wata o Maryam ko manga Hawari-in: A antawa-a i manga tabanga Akun si-i ko Allah? Pitharo o manga Hawari-on: Sukami i manga tabanga o Allah. Na Miyaratiyaya so saba-ad ko manga Moriyatao o Israil, na Miyongkir so saba-ad. Na piyakabagur Ami so Miyamaratiyaya, ko kishosogata-an niran ko ridowai ran, na miyabaloi siran a miyamakada-ag
